artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; view of figure in a small boat and long bridge at R in a rain shower; trees at L leaning in wind; dark sky
inscription: 近江八景の内　瀬田の唐橋　大正七年五月 {Ōmi hakkei no uchi Seta no karahashi, Taishō shichinen gogatsu} (The Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Chinese Bridge at Seta, May 1918)
markings: red collector seal: 杜品 {Tobin}; on back, red seal: 伊藤深水画　近江八景瀬田　摺刷二百枚限の内　第四十六番 {Itō Shinsui ga, Ōmi hakkei Seta shūsatsu nihyaku mai kagiri no uchi, dai yonjūroku ban} (picture by Itō Shinsui, Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Seta, printed edition of 200, number 46); red square publisher seals: 版元 {hanmoto} (publisher), ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Lake Biwa (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景の内)
title: Chinese Bridge at Seta
